vague_description: A woman is trying to balance her dietary intake of smoothies and protein bars while adhering to certain nutritional constraints and preferences.
detailed_description: A woman on a diet needs to eat two types of meal preps, a smoothie and a protein bar. Each smoothie contains \param{ProteinSmoothie} units of protein and \param{CaloriesSmoothie} calories. Each protein bar contains \param{ProteinBar} units of protein and \param{CaloriesBar} calories. The woman must eat \param{RatioBarsSmoothies} times more protein bars than smoothies. If the woman can consume at most \param{MaxCalories} calories, how many of each should she eat or drink to maximize her protein intake?
target_objective: Maximize the woman's protein intake from the meal preps
target_constraints: Ratio of protein bars to smoothies is exactly RatioBarsSmoothies
Total calorie intake is at most MaxCalories
Number of protein bars is non-negative
target_parameters: Units of protein in one smoothie
Units of protein in one protein bar
The ratio of the quantity of protein bars to smoothies
